WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please re-open (click the Re-open link at the top of this form) when you're able to provide some extra information. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description: When you use Go To Definition on a typescript object or method VS starts to use a very high amount of CPU and memory sometimes causing VS or to lock up. The workaround is to kill devenv.
WorkItem.Summary: Go To Definition Causes High CPU/Memory Usage

Comments.Message:
Thanks for reporting.

Can you give us some more info to help us reproduce this problem.

Which version are you using?
How large is your project? Does it happen in a new "Html Application with Typescript" ?
Does it happen on all object/functions or specific ones; e.g. things defined in lib.d.ts, in an external module, or in another d.ts file.
